subtitles_text: JEFF PROBST:  16 Americans,   marooned for 39 days
in the middle  of the South China Sea.

they competed against each  other to remain on the island,
but now the tribes   have merged into one.
and it is everyone  for themselves.

and will leave the island     with $1 million in cash.

as the two tribes     merged into one.
